action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spore servant makes two pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (Escape {@dc 14}) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the spore servant doesn't have two other creatures {@condition grappled}.
